params._chain_id: EIP-155 Chain-ID of the chain where this contract is deployed
params._max_token_networks: the number of tokens that can be registered MAX_UINT256 means no limits
params._secret_registry_address: The address of SecretRegistry that's used by all TokenNetworks created by this contract
params._settlement_timeout_max: The longest settlement period (in number of blocks) that can be chosen at the channel opening
params._settlement_timeout_min: The shortest settlement period (in number of blocks) that can be chosen at the channel opening

params.contract_address: The address to check whether a contract is deployed or not

returns._0: True if a contract exists, false otherwise

params._token_address: Ethereum address of an already deployed token, to be used in the new TokenNetwork contract

createERC20TokenNetwork(address,uint256,.notice: Deploy a new TokenNetwork contract for the Token deployed at `_token_address`

userdoc.notice: The TokenNetwork Registry deploys new TokenNetwork contracts for the Raiden Network protocol.
